pdfid.py: Tool to test a PDF file

Source code put in public domain by Didier Stevens, no Copyright
https://DidierStevens.com
Use at your own risk

This version (pdfid_PL.py) has been modified by Philippe Lagadec for easier 
integration into Python applications as a module. 

See also:
http://blog.didierstevens.com/programs/pdf-tools/
http://blog.didierstevens.com/2009/04/29/quickpost-disarming-a-pdf-file/
